svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 10, 2024" date: "2024-02-09"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
* Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks
Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync Invalid blocks :
triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion Electra upgrade
scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Priorities & complexities of
potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase
max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in
parallel to Electra
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks
* Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync
Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync
* Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion
Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion
* Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Priorities &
complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547)
and increase max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned peerDAS (EIP7594) can be
developed in parallel to Electra
Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024):
* Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion
lists (EIP7547) and increase max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned
Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion
* peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
* Holešky testnet uneventfully upgraded to Dencun
Holešky testnet uneventfully upgraded to Dencun
* Dencun interop testing call video : testing churn limit on Holešky testnet &
shadowfork planned with mainnet releases
Dencun interop testing call video : testing churn limit on Holešky testnet &
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* 🚨 Lido at 31.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 31.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority
, could cause a chain split Supermajority dashboard : simulate node operators changing
to minority clients Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split Supermajority
dashboard : simulate node operators changing to minority clients
Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split
* Supermajority dashboard : simulate node operators changing to minority clients
* Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Layer 1
* Toni Wahrstätter & Vitalik: options to increase block gas limit via increasing
calldata cost; incentivize L2s to use blobs for data availability
Toni Wahrstätter & Vitalik: options to increase block gas limit via increasing
* bloXroute relay in optimistic mode broadcast invalid blocks built by rsync builder
on Feb 6 resulting in 9 missed slots
bloXroute relay in optimistic mode broadcast invalid blocks built by rsync builder on
Feb 6 resulting in 9 missed slots
* Reth roadmap (EL client in Rust): targeting v0.2 beta late Feb & v1 production by
end of April
Reth roadmap (EL client in Rust): targeting v0.2 beta late Feb & v1 production by end
of April
Research
* Overview of spec changes for inclusion lists
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.15.1 : hotfixes for Besu users, blindedLocal & lock
file issues
Consensus layer:
* Lodestar v1.15.1 : hotfixes for Besu users, blindedLocal & lock file issues
* Execution layer: Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Era1 initial implementation
, provides Execution Layer data history pre-merge; post-merge Execution Layer data is
encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for
Dencun, sidechain root validation & networking improvements
Execution layer:
* Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Era1 initial implementation , provides
Execution Layer data history pre-merge; post-merge Execution Layer data is
encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files
Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
* Era1 initial implementation , provides Execution Layer data history pre-merge;
post-merge Execution Layer data is encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files
* Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation &
networking improvements
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation &
For stakers
* Remy Roy: guide to migrating a validator to a larger disk
Layer 2
* Polygon Type 1 Prover open sourced
Polygon Type 1 Prover open sourced
* RollCall (L2 standards) precompiles breakout call and notes : secp256r1 precompile
(RIP7212) live on Polygon testnet and rollup precompile registry in progress
RollCall (L2 standards) precompiles breakout call and notes : secp256r1 precompile
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs: EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree EIP7619 : Precompile
Falcon512 generic verifier
EIPs:
* EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree
EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree
* EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
* RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals): RIP7614 : Expose call stack to contracts
RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals):
* RIP7614 : Expose call stack to contracts
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract ERC7615 : Atomic
push-based data feed among contracts ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token ERC7617 : Chunk
support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3
URL
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract
ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract
* ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts
ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts
* ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token
ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token
* ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL
ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL
* ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
Stuff for developers
* EthereumJS releases : Dencun upgrade support, WASM used by default for crypto
primitives, RPCStateManager, expanded EIP1186 proof functionality and Tx addSignature
API
EthereumJS releases : Dencun upgrade support, WASM used by default for crypto
* Gaslite Merkle Drop base contracts: GasliteMerkleDN (native tokens) &
GasliteMerkleDT (ERC20)
Gaslite Merkle Drop base contracts: GasliteMerkleDN (native tokens) & GasliteMerkleDT
(ERC20)
* Ethers js v6.11.0 : adds EIP4844 blob transactions
Ethers js v6.11.0 : adds EIP4844 blob transactions
* Ethers-kt (Kotlin): async library for EVM interaction, targets JVM & Android
platforms
Ethers-kt (Kotlin): async library for EVM interaction, targets JVM & Android platforms
Ecosystem
* Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group , 10 week series starts Feb 19, research &
development tracks, precursor to fifth cohort
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group , 10 week series starts Feb 19, research &
* Ethereum Foundation academic grants round , $1M available
Ethereum Foundation academic grants round , $1M available
Job Listings
* Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
* Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer (DSE) and Cryptography Researcher
Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer (DSE) and Cryptography Researcher
* EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
* Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
* Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
* MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.4 to 367 gwei, with 35.2 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 22.2 gwei 10.1k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.4 to 367 gwei, with 35.2 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei
* 10.1k ETH net burn this week
10.1k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $2,279 - $2,522, currently $2,495
ETHUSD : $2,279 - $2,522, currently $2,495
* ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* GoDaddy integrated with ENS, users can associate an address with their domain name
GoDaddy integrated with ENS, users can associate an address with their domain name
* POAP Collections : curate groups of POAPs
POAP Collections : curate groups of POAPs
* Kain Warwick: Synthetix 2024 roadmap
Kain Warwick: Synthetix 2024 roadmap
* Brice reflects on app governance upon leaving GHO liquidity committee
Brice reflects on app governance upon leaving GHO liquidity committee
* Gitcoin Grants proposed updates : refocus on open source software & ETH
infrastructure with rounds every 6 months & $1M matching pool, communities can run
their own web3 community & education rounds
Gitcoin Grants proposed updates : refocus on open source software & ETH infrastructure
with rounds every 6 months & $1M matching pool, communities can run their own web3
community & education rounds
Regulation/business/tokens
* SEC “dealer” rule finalized , excludes those with/controlling less than $50M in
assets
SEC “dealer” rule finalized , excludes those with/controlling less than $50M in assets
* Jake Chervinsky: state of crypto vs SEC
Jake Chervinsky: state of crypto vs SEC
* Kain Warwick: SEC response to ICOs created worse outcomes than if they had done
nothing
Kain Warwick: SEC response to ICOs created worse outcomes than if they had done
General
* Josh Stark: Trust Experience shape expectations of future blockchain behavior
Josh Stark: Trust Experience shape expectations of future blockchain behavior
* Vitalik: authenticate people by asking security questions to mitigate deep fakes
Vitalik: authenticate people by asking security questions to mitigate deep fakes
* Constant-size zk-SNARKs in ROM from Falsifiable Assumptions
Constant-size zk-SNARKs in ROM from Falsifiable Assumptions
Publisher & Founder: @evan van ness ; Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the
most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-february-10-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Feb 19 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group 10 week series starts
Feb 19 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group 10 week series starts
* Feb 23-Mar 3 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek & hackathon
Feb 23-Mar 3 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek & hackathon
* Mar 5 – EF academic grants round application deadline
Mar 5 – EF academic grants round application deadline
* Mar 13 – mainnet Dencun upgrade epoch 269568
Mar 13 – mainnet Dencun upgrade epoch 269568
* Mar 13-14 – ETHLatam (San Pedro Sula, Honduras)
Mar 13-14 – ETHLatam (San Pedro Sula, Honduras)
* Mar 15-17 – ETHGlobal London hackathon
Mar 15-17 – ETHGlobal London hackathon
* Mar 19-21 – ETH Canal (Panama City, Panamá) conference & hackathon
Mar 19-21 – ETH Canal (Panama City, Panamá) conference & hackathon
* Mar 21-24 – ETHTaipei conference & hackathon
Mar 21-24 – ETHTaipei conference & hackathon
* Mar 22-24 – ETHSamba (Rio)
Mar 22-24 – ETHSamba (Rio)
* Mar 27-30 – ETH Bucharest conference & hackathon
Mar 27-30 – ETH Bucharest conference & hackathon
* Mar 29-31 – ETH Seoul hackathon
Mar 29-31 – ETH Seoul hackathon
* Apr 5-26 – ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum virtual hackathon
Apr 5-26 – ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum virtual hackathon
* Apr 5-7 – EthereumZuri.ch conference
Apr 5-7 – EthereumZuri.ch conference
* Apr 12-14 – ETHDam (Amsterdam) conference & hackathon
Apr 12-14 – ETHDam (Amsterdam) conference & hackathon
* Apr 16-18 – EY Global blockchain summit (London)
Apr 16-18 – EY Global blockchain summit (London)
* May 3-5 – ETHGlobal Sydney hackathon
May 3-5 – ETHGlobal Sydney hackathon
* May 21-23 – DappCon (Berlin)
May 21-23 – DappCon (Berlin)
* May 24-26 – ETHBerlin hackathon
May 24-26 – ETHBerlin hackathon
* May 31-Jun 2 – ETHDublin hackathon & conference
May 31-Jun 2 – ETHDublin hackathon & conference
* May 31-Jun 2 – ETHPrague conference & hackathon
May 31-Jun 2 – ETHPrague conference & hackathon
* Jun 3-5 – ETH Belgrade conference
Jun 3-5 – ETH Belgrade conference
* Jul 8-11 – EthCC (Brussels) conference
Jul 8-11 – EthCC (Brussels) conference
* Jul 12-14 – ETHGlobal Brussels hackathon
Jul 12-14 – ETHGlobal Brussels hackathon
* Jul 26-30 – EDCON Tokyo conference
Jul 26-30 – EDCON Tokyo conference
* Aug 23-Sep 13 – ETHGlobal ETHOnline virtual hackathon
Aug 23-Sep 13 – ETHGlobal ETHOnline virtual hackathon
* Sep 20-22 – ETHGlobal Singapore hackathon
Sep 20-22 – ETHGlobal Singapore hackathon
* Oct 18-20 – ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
Oct 18-20 – ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
* Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
* Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
